list-item.p: The effects of climate change were recently experienced in their communities in the form of hot and extremely hot weather (mean = 3.93; s.d. = 1.14).
Climate change has severe effects on agriculture (mean = 4.49; s.d. = 0.77).
Climate change has severe impacts on water supply (mean = 4.31; s.d. = 0.86).
Climate change has severe impacts on health (mean = 4.32; s.d. = 0.92).
My community is vulnerable to the impacts of climate change (mean = 4.30; s.d. = 1.23).
